data.text: «Nimizai ɠa wo luɠɔ, kololala lointi,
«Wa ziɛzu, wo ɗa li Ezipete yooi zu,
Falaɠɔn ʋɔ bɛ lɔɔɠu wo fai ɠa ɠɛ ga unfe faa wo ʋɛ,
Wa-ɠundiɠiiti ta na Soan,
Ti pɛ ta unfe niima nuɓusɛiti faa zu,
Keela wooi é wosu toganiiti faa zu ti lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu yeezazu ʋele yooi zu:
Ezipete ɓɔbai ɠa ga wafuun faa, gaamɔlɛ anii,
Ʋaana, naati sɛʋɛ ti ɠaazu kokologi ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ kololala nuɓusɛiti be,
Ti ɗa ɠɛ GALA goo wo nuiti ma:
À zeɠe pele ʋagɔi ʋa, à pele zɔlegi yɛ ná.
Naa ɠa é ba, Izilayɛle ná-GALA Ɲadegai wooi ɠa é ga nii:
naama vaaɠaaza golai ɠa ɠɛ wo ʋɛ
Siɠigi ɠa ɓezeɠele
Naa ɠa é ba, Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI Izilayɛle ná-GALA Ɲadegai wooi ɠa é ga nii:
Wo ɠɛni ma:
Wo zili nu ɠila kpegi ɠa nu waagilagi (1.000) maalua,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa maaɓɔungi wosu ɠɔ,
Ee, Siyɔn nuɓusɛiti, wo zeini Zeluzalɛme,
Mazɔlɔɔ Maliɠii ɠa daamianigi ve wo ya kidaaʋili foloi,
Siɛgi zu è ɠɛɛzu è li ga è-yeezazu ʋelei ɓaa è-ɠɔʋɛzu ʋelei,
Walii siaai wa-ɠɔɔɠɔ ganigiti ma
Maliɠii ɠa tonai ve wo ʋɛ,
Nikɛiti ta soovalegiti ta ɠɛ zooi wolizu,
Nu ʋaa vaa wolai ma voloi,
Alugi ɠa volo eɠɛ foloi,
Wɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɠɔi ʋa,
Daa viilɛi ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kɔtuɗɛi fegai,
Wa guyei loo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa wooi ɠula, goo maayikiai,
Mazɔlɔɔ Asiili nuiti sasu ɠa ɓali
Tamadegi ta kɔnigi ti-wooi ɠa ɠɛ mɛnisu,
Kaite suɠoozaa, tutui zuɓɛtɛʋɛ na,
